overview: This is first ayngaran's collection of songs in blu-ray.Featuring selected songs from Sivaji, Ayan, Aadhavan, Aegan, Villu, Peranmai, Kanthasamy and Pokkisham. Video: 1080p High Definition 16x9 / 2.35:1 AVC-4 Audio: Track 1 - Tamil 5.1 LPCM Uncompressed (48 kHz/24bit), Track 2 -Tamil 5.1 Dolby Digital Subtitles: English
title: ayngaran digital musical bluray 1
